scripts.simpledeploy: npm run olddeploy && ssh root@207.154.253.254 "cd my-test-site && git pull"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && gh-pages -d build && ssh root@207.154.253.254 "pm2 delete all ; if [ -d "my-test-site" ] ; then ( cd my-test-site && git pull && pm2 serve ) ; else ( git clone -b gh-pages git@github.com:Hupra/my-test-site.git ; pm2 serve my-test-site ) ; fi ;"
